name: Skyscraper Content Uploading Service
short_description:
The Skyscraper Content Uploading Service (SCUS) is a service that lets you easily upload your buildings and data for Skyscraper (http://www.skyscrapersim.com/) for everyone to see.
You are able to upload files online even if you do not have a SourceForge account. For more information, including how to upload files, see the wiki.
summary: A quick and easy way to upload your Skyscraper content
